name: Moldermind
description:
Moldermind is a simple and short endless arcade-style top-down arena shooter but with a twist. That being... you are the bullet!

Use your special boost/dash attack by holding your mouse's left button to ram into enemies and destroy em all.

Your objective? Get as much score as you can and survive.

Features so far:

-8 different enemies ready to take you down.

-A simple combo score system and a simple chain system (the more enemies you kill with a single dash [with a limit ofc] the more score you will obtain.

-Simple controls which is your literal mouse and holding the left button.

-6 Short chiptunes to help with the action flow (a different one plays randomly each playthrough).

Feedback is appreciated. Currently on beta.

Programming, sound and graphics all made by Rosehtra/AnthonyRose (me)
